headline: Ohio shows Trump still owns the GOP
author: Albert Hunt
sentences: Some Washington establishment Republicans, principally Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell (R-Ky.), have given indications they hoped Trump's influence was diminishing and that the party could look ahead in the midterm contests this year and the 2024 presidential election.
